titles.title: Health Care Cost Integrity and Fairness Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable and advancable credit against income tax for health insurance costs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/28/2004--Introduced. Health Care Cost Integrity and Fairness Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited (up to $3,000 annually) advanceable tax credit for amounts paid for qualified health insurance for coverage of the taxpayer, his spouse, and dependents.
